thread.section_title: Displayit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Displayit | displayit.com
thread.title: Miranda

author: Miranda
title: Miranda
text:
I ordered the Graffiti 8x10 and a double sided 36" banner, I also purchased some service time with a graphic designer. From start to end the Display it team helped me decide what would appropriately fill my 20x20 booth and worked with my urgent requests. The designer I worked with (Teresa) understood my vision and executed it perfectly. She sent proofs quickly and did a few revisions with no problem.
My displays were shipped with 2-day delivery, awesome!
The final product was superb quality, very professional looking.
Our team is super impressed with the outcome.
